long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the delightful realm of digital games where cats rule, Cats Drop emerges as a standout merging puzzle experience. Once known as SSRB Ball, this game has been rebranded to capture the hearts of cat enthusiasts and puzzle lovers alike with a simple yet engaging premise: combine cats to create the ultimate mega cat!

Cats Drop isn't just another casual game; it's a test of strategy and timing. Players are presented with a virtual measuring cup, into which various cats of different colors and sizes are dropped. The challenge lies in positioning these cats in such a way that identical ones merge, evolving into larger versions. With each successful merge, players see their scores soar, but there's a catch: space is limited, and the game ends when the cup overflows. 

The controls are refreshingly straightforward, making Cats Drop accessible to players of all ages. Simply move your cat with the mouse and click to drop it into place. This ease of play, combined with the charming graphics, ensures that both young players and seasoned puzzle solvers can enjoy the game's layers of strategy.

If you have any questions about our Cats Drop Unblocked game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Cats Drop Unblocked game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
